text: Zoltán Žebík (born 3 August 1992) is a retired Slovak footballer who last played for DOXXbet liga club FC VSS Košice . as a centre back. ==Club career== ===MFK Košice=== Žebík made his professional Fortuna Liga's debut for MFK Košice on April 18, 2015 against DAC Dunajská Streda.DAC VS. title: Zoltán Žebík
